dotnetType.name: DurationSerializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DurationLogicalType" /> and attempts to
            map it to <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.

overloads.summary: Creates a new duration serializer builder case.

returns.summary:
An action that accepts an object and a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and writes the serialized
            object to the stream.

overloads.summary: Builds a duration serializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated serializers should use for write operations.

returns.summary:
Whether the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FixedSchema" /> with size 12 and logical type
            <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DurationLogicalType" />.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a schema.
Determines whether the case can be applied to a type resolution.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DurationSerializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinarySerializerBuilderCase
